content.question: Dr. Sperry records a video of Jim, a participant in split-brain research, and then plays it in class to teach students about hemispheric differences. Which of the following procedures should Dr. Sperry use to show the video in class?

choices.label: Obtain Jim’s permission to use the video.
Debrief Jim after the research session.
Demonstrate the educational value of the video to Jim.

content.answer: Obtain Jim’s permission to use the video.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
